titleStmt.title: Pseudeleutheria. Or Lawlesse liberty. Set forth in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Major of London, &c. in Pauls, Aug. 16. 1646. / By Edvvard Terry, Minister of the Word, and pastor of the church at Great-Greenford in the country of Middlesex. Sept. 11. 1646. Imprimatur. John Downame.
titleStmt.author: Terry, Edward, 1590-1660.

Set forth in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Major of London, &c. in Pauls, Aug. 16. 1646. / By Edvvard Terry, Minister of the Word, and pastor of the church at Great-Greenford in the country of Middlesex. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, and are to be sold by Charles Greene, at his shop in Ivie Lane, at the signe of the Gun.,

notesStmt.note: The first word in the title is printed in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
